services.title: Request an Installment Plan
services.summary: An e-service that allows you to request installment payments in cases where you face difficulties in paying the full amount due.
steps: Log into ZATCA website
Go to "Indirect Tax - Value Added Tax"
Click "VAT Installment Plan"
Select "Create New Request", fill in the request form, and complete the steps to submit the request
Once approved, a notification of your installment plan will be sent to you
eligibility: Submit a request using the portal
Bank statement for the last 3 months
Explain the justification for the installment request

services.title: Zakat Return
services.summary: This e-service allows users to submit Zakat declarations (returns) for a specific financial period (including amendments).
steps: Log in to the taxpayer portal.
Select Zakat Return from Zakat services.
Fill in the return details for the financial period.
Submit and receive confirmation.

services.title: Request for Zakat Return Amendment
services.summary: This e-service allows you to submit a request to amend Zakat returns after submitting them.
steps: Log in to the taxpayer portal.
Navigate to Zakat services.
Select Request for Zakat Return Amendment.
Provide the amendment details and submit.

services.title: Zakat Payment
services.summary: It is an e-service that enables you to pay your dues through a SADAD bill, either via online banking services or ATM machines.
steps: Log in to the taxpayer portal.
Select Zakat Payment from services.
View your outstanding dues.
Generate SADAD bill and pay via online banking or ATM.
eligibility: Registered taxpayer with outstanding Zakat dues

services.title: Holding Company Deregistration
services.summary: Through this e-service, you are allowed to deregister one or multiple holding companies along with its subsidiaries.
steps: Log in to the taxpayer portal.
Navigate to Zakat services.
Select Holding Company Deregistration.
Provide company details and submit request.
eligibility: All subsidiaries must be eligible for deregistration

services.title: Registering Holding Company
services.summary: Through this e-service, you are allowed to register one or multiple holding companies along with its subsidiaries.
steps: Log in to the taxpayer portal.
Navigate to Zakat services.
Select Registering Holding Company.
Fill in company and subsidiaries details.
Submit and receive registration confirmation.
eligibility: All subsidiaries must meet registration criteria
